scripts.export: next build && next export && echo '' >> out/.nojekyll
scripts.push-main-defaultBranch: cd out && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/vacantthinker-nextjs-blog/vacantthinker-nextjs-blog.github.io.git && git add . && git commit -m "new" && git branch main master && git checkout main && git push origin main --force
scripts.export-and-push-main-defaultBranch: npm run export && npm run push-main-defaultBranch && npm run clean-out
scripts.push-master: git checkout master && git add . && git commit -m 'n' && git push origin master --force
scripts.push-master-and-main-defaultBranch: npm run push-master && npm run export-and-push-main-defaultBranch
